src.data_prep.scripts package

Submodules

src.data_prep.scripts.create_metadata module

Script to create metadata file for UIowa and CHOP for view labeling

src.data_prep.scripts.create_metadata.clean_image_dsets_metadata()[source]
Preprocess metadata for image datasets:

  1. SickKids Silent Trial

  2. Stanford (image)

  3. UIowa

  4. CHOP

Note

Not a lot to be done because they were created through this script as well.

src.data_prep.scripts.create_metadata.clean_sickkids_video_metadata()[source]
Preprocesses raw SickKids (video) to:

  1. extract view label and its sub-parts plane and side,

  2. add unlabeled data

src.data_prep.scripts.create_metadata.clean_stanford_video_metadata()[source]

Preprocess raw Stanford (video) metadata

src.data_prep.scripts.create_metadata.create_chop_metadata(dir_data, save_path=None)[source]

Based on folder structure and image names, create metadata table with relative image paths.

Parameters:

  • dir_data (str) – Path to CHOP folder

  • save_path (str, optional) – If provided, save metadata table to file path

Returns:

Metadata table containing filename, label, id, visit and seq_number

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame

src.data_prep.scripts.create_metadata.main_clean_metadata()[source]

Create clean metadata files for video and image datasets.

src.data_prep.scripts.create_metadata.main_correct_labels(ref_path='corrected_view_labels.xlsx', label_col='plane')[source]

Correct labels for each dataset based on a reference file

Parameters:

  • ref_path (str) – Path to XLSX file containing modified labels and (dset, id, visit, seq_number) for every image that needs correction

  • label_col (str) – Name of column whose label is corrected

src.data_prep.scripts.create_metadata.main_prepare_image_datasets()[source]
Prepare image datasets, specifically:

  1. Create CHOP metadata

  2. Prepare UIowa data and create metadata

  3. Create Stanford (image) metadata

  4. Create SickKids Silent Trial metadata

src.data_prep.scripts.create_metadata.preprocess_uiowa_data(src_dir='/hpf/largeprojects/ccmbio/shua/data/ViewLabeling/UIowa', dst_dir='/hpf/largeprojects/ccmbio/shua/data/ViewLabeling/UIowa/')[source]

Preprocesses UIowa Data and places it into the ViewLabeling data directory.

Parameters:

  • src_dir (str, optional) – Source directory containined nested data, by default SRC_DIR_UIOWA_DATA

  • dst_dir (str, optional) – Destination directory to store preprocessed images, where patient ID is prepended to the original filename, by default constants.DSET_TO_IMG_SUBDIR_FULL[“uiowa”]

src.data_prep.scripts.create_metadata.print_basic_data_stats(df_metadata)[source]

Print basic stats about the data

Parameters:

df_metadata (pd.DataFrame) – Each row is metadata for an US image
